# isPanningInterfaceVisible

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether the map template is displaying the panning interface.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var isPanningInterfaceVisible: Bool { get }
```

## Panning the Map

- **showPanningInterface(animated:)**: Shows the panning interface on the map.
- **dismissPanningInterface(animated:)**: Dismisses the panning interface.

items.description: Shows the panning interface on the map.
